title: ADiya sEvaDi
sahitya:
ADiya sEvaDi tEdip-paNindEn anjana vaNNA ambujanAbhA nin


anupallavi

  nADi gOpiyaruDan kUDi yamunA nadik-karaiyinilE pADi magizhndu viLai-


caraNam    kamala mukhamadil shuruL kUzhADa kazhuttilaNi tuLabha mAlaiyum Ada
 kanaka shilambu konji viLaiyADa kALiyan shiramadil kaLippuDan nartanam
